entry.title: Hue Blanc Keratin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Suzy
Type: Keratin
Price: 18.25

Are you looking for the best Keratin Kit? Add Keratin to any lash lift kit as the final step  of the lash lift procedure to deep condition the lashes. Keratin will help rebuild the protein in the hair

entry.title: Curl Five™ Lash Lift Step 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: StarColor New
Type: Dolly Lash Lift
Price: 25.00

(previously known as 5-minute lash lift and is the SAME as the original formula)

Curl Five™ Lash Lift, by Lashes By Design, is the hottest Lash Lift trend in the Eyelash industry.  Compared to leading lash lift products, the Curl Five Lash Lift procedure will save almost 30 minutes off the service!  

Lashes will stay lifted and keep their curl, even after swimming or showering, for up to 12 weeks.  For best results, offer re-curls every 6 weeks, depending on the speed of your client's lash growth cycle.

Why Choose a Pump?

With Airless Pump Technology, the lash lift products will stay fresh for up to 1 year after opening. Here are some of the benefits:

  • No more sealing or wasting sachets
  • No more messy sachets in ziplock bags!
  • Only use EXACTLY what you need for each client
  • Product stays fresh as the day you opened it
  • Less packaging and waste
  • Easier to Store

Benefits:

  • 5 minute per solution saves you time
  • no waste single-use sachets
  • hygienic
  • the product lasts for 2 years unopened
  • Makes natural eyelashes appear longer without the use of eyelash extensions
  • Lashes stay lifted 6-8 weeks
  • No damage to the natural eyelashes
  • Faster application techniques saving you time
  • Clients can swim, shower and play with no fuss, no aftercare
  • Suitable for short & long eyelashes
  • Allows for perfect positioning of lashes
  • Formaldehyde-free

Full Starter Kit includes:

  1. Lift Lotion #1 Pump (5 ml)
  2. Set Lotion #2 Pump (5 ml) Sodium Bromide Free
  3. Condition Lotion #3 Pump (5 ml)
  4. Curl Five Lash Lift Adhesive x 1 bottle 
  5. Silicone Shields 5mixed sizes
Directions for Lash Lift use:
Apply silicone pads to upper eyelid with water-based lash lift adhesive.

Comb lashes onto the silicone pad. 

Apply step 1 generously form the base of the lash. Wipe off any solution from the tips of the lashes. Set the timer for at least 5-7 minutes per eye as soon as you apply lotion. Thicker lashes will take 7 minutes. 

Remove any excess solution from step one with a lint-free applicator. Add Step #2 SET using the same timer settings as step 1.

Remove the excess solution from Step #2 SET with a lint-free applicator.

Apply either tint for 5 minutes
Apply Step #3 CONDITION solution for 5 minutes.
Remove pads and clean with a slightly damp cotton round

Ingredients:
Step #1 LIFT: Water, Ethanolamine, Thioglycolic Acid, 1-Hexadecanol, Polyquaternium-28, Steartrimonium Chloride, C12-15 Pareth-10, Glycerin, Glyceryl Monostearate, perfume, ethylenediaminetetraacetic Acid Disodium salt
Step #2 SET: Water, 1-Hexadecanol, Steartrimonium Chloride, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Disodium Phosphate
Step #3 CONDITION: Propylene Glycol, Methylparaben, Polysorbate, Collagen, Purified Water
*caution* Health Canada has added Sodium Bromate to their banned substance list. This impacts ALL brands of lash lift products. Check the ingredients to make sure you are always purchasing Sodium Bromate Free solutions.

entry.title: Dolly Lash Lift Setting Solution - Sodium Bromate Free
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dolly
Type: Dolly Lash Lift
Price: 12.00

*professional use only product

Dolly Lash Lift Setting Solution that is sodium bromate-free replaces the "blue" bottles from Dolly kits

Bottles: There is enough solution in the bottle to do approximately 10-15 clients.

Ingredients: Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-75 Lanolin, Dimethicone, Hydrolyzed Sik, Jojoba seed oil, Triticum Vulgare Germ Oil Unsaponifiables, Fragrance, Sodium Hydrogen Phosphate, Sodium Bensphate, Sodium Benzoate, Aqua

Certified Professional Use Only

entry.title: Mina Thread
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mina
Type: Brow Thread
Price: 9.00

Mina Thread is used to remove excess brow hair from the area and unwanted facial hair. It is made of cotton, grown and harvested without the use of any pesticides, herbicides, insecticides, chemical fertilizers or any other chemicals, on land that has been chemically free for at least 3 years. This ensures the production of cotton that is not only environment friendly but is skin-friendly also, making it suitable for use on the most sensitive skin types.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Mina Thread is intended for professional use and for this reason the professional use and for this reason, the professional using this product must be familiar with at least one facial hair removal technique. Prior to use, it is necessary to wash the hands and facial area using Mina Henna.

Net Qty.: 300meter

entry.title: Mina White Brow Paste and Barrier
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mina
Type:
Price: 13.30

Mina White Brow Paste is the secret professional brow artists use to get picture-perfect eyebrows with a defined shape and the desired look. Outline the brows with this thick white paste, or sketch the right shape of the eyebrows visible to you & the client that helps to perfect your brow tinting.

The paste also assists to avoid stains and smudges on the skin.

Application Accessories:

Angled Brow Brush - use a flat edge to create a barrier around the precise area you want to work with. Remove after with cotton rounds

Threading Thread - place a small amount of paste onto a flat sterile surface and roll threading thread in the paste. Use the thread to make temporary guidelines for microblading, permanent makeup, or henna treatments

INGREDIENTS: Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclomethicone, Stearyl Dimethicone, Silica Tocopheryl acetate, Carnauba wax, Beeswax, May Contain: Titanium dioxide CI 77891

Net Qty.: 5g

Online Instructions: https://www.ibrowhenna.com/pages/how-to-use

entry.title: Dolly Lash Lift Kit bottles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dolly
Type:
Price: 42.00

*professional use only product

Dolly Lash Lift has been a gold standard in the Lash Lift industry for years. They finally have come out with a product that complies with the sodium bromate ban that came into effect in December 2019. 

Bottles: There is enough solution in the bottle to do approximately 10-15 clients. Each bottle contains 4 ml of solution.

entry.title: Curl Five™ Lash Lift Adhesive Regular
entry.summary:
Vendor: StarColor New
Type: Dolly Lash Lift
Price: 19.99

This is our staff pick for lash lift adhesive. It is very similar to the dolly lash lift adhesive.

Directions:
  • Apply to base of the silicone pad
  • Attach silicone pad to the eyelid, close as possible to lash line
  • Apply a thin line across the base of the pad
  • Lift small batches of lashes and adhere to the silicone pad
  • Before the adhesive dries, use the lash lift comb or pick to arrange and evenly separate lashes

Adjust the texture of the adhesive as necessary:

  • If the adhesive is not sticky enough - let it get tacky for 30 seconds before applying lashes
  • If the adhesive is too sticky - use a wet brush to aid in spreading the adhesive

Ingredients: Agua, Polyvinyl Alchohol, Glycerin, Castor Oil

entry.title: Refectocil Tint Remover
entry.summary:
Vendor: natali
Type: tint
Price: 31.00

Gently remove tint from skin

RefectoCil Tint Remover is a stain remover and was developed to quickly and gently remove excess tint spots from the skin, produced when tinting eyelashes and eyebrows.

Application: Immediately after tinting, dampen a cotton ball with RefectoCil Tint Remover and gently wipe away the tint.

CAUTION: Do not apply directly to the eyelashes or to the skin close to the eyes!

Contents: 100ml

Lashes will stay lifted and keep their curl, even after swimming or showering, for up to 12 weeks.  For best results, offer re-curls every 6 weeks, depending on the speed of your client's lash growth cycle.

Apply step 1 generously from the base of the lash. Wipe off any solution from the tips of the lashes. Set the timer for at least 5-7 minutes per eye as soon as you apply lotion. Thicker lashes will take 7 minutes.

entry.title: Lash Lift Combs 10/pack
entry.summary:

entry.title: Refectocil Tint
entry.summary:
Vendor: natali
Type: tint
Price: 16.07

RefectoCil Tint will result in deep, full and even more intense than ever before and so the lashes appear visibly longer and more voluminous. The tint is absolutely smudge and waterproof and lasts up to 6 weeks.

With RefectoCil you will always achieve a beautiful, long-lasting and intensive tinting result of eyelashes and eyebrows. What else you need to know: Tinted eyelashes appear clearly denser, as the tinting accentuates the full length of the lashes faded by sun and water. The tint highlights and lengthens short lashes; it adds gloss and shine to dull hairs and freshens already greying lashes and brows. Tinted eyebrows appear nicely defined and more colour intensive. Your eyes appear livelier and expressive, even without make-up. The best result is achieved when applying the tint regularly because with each tinting the colour will penetrate deeply into the eyelashes leaving them more intensely and longer-lasting coloured.

We now offer Blonde Bleaching paste which can be used to lift color or just to lighten any natural color.

PROFESSIONAL USE ONLY

entry.title: Refectocil Oxidant 3% Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: natali
Type: tint
Price: 13.50

What it is: Liquid peroxide for RefectoCil eyelash and eyebrow tints.

What it does: RefectoCil Oxidant 3-Percent liquid is a stabilized developer especially formulated to be used with RefectoCil eyelash and eyebrow tints.

What else you need to know:

Important note: Only the use of RefectoCil Oxidant guarantees the widely known perfect tinting results with RefectoCil tints. Therefore use RefectoCil Eyelash and eyebrow tints always with RefectoCil Oxidant 3-Percent liquid or cream.
